name: Run Precommit & Fix
prompt:
Run 'npm run precommit' and fix any issues that are encountered. The precommit script runs build (which includes linting, type checking, and compilation), linting, and tests.

For each issue:
1. Identify the root cause
2. Fix the issue in the appropriate source file(s)
3. Re-run the affected step to verify the fix

Continue until all issues are resolved and the precommit script completes successfully.
